name: Far Darrig
description: The Far Darrig is a small fey creature with a striking combination of agility and strength, showcasing woodland characteristics. It wields an Antler Glaive and is capable of summoning woodland creatures for aid in battle.
memorable: Utilizes woodland companions and exhibits agility and strength despite being small.
goals: To defend its territory and leverage allies in combat.
relations: May be encountered alongside other woodland creatures or fey beings.
strengths: Strong in melee combat and has excellent mobility in wooded areas.
weaknesses: Average intelligence limits its tactical options.
attacks: Antler Glaive delivers piercing or slashing damage along with force damage and can knock targets prone.
most_powerful_ability: Woodland Friends allows it to summon allies such as elk or giant weasels to aid in combat.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet and has a passive perception of 14.
skills: Proficient in Nature, Animal Handling, Perception, and Survival with a +4 modifier, showcasing adaptability in the wilderness.
additional_information: Strong charisma aids in persuasive interactions.
Can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus in forests.
Possesses good saving throw against charms and manipulations.
Uses a combination of physical attacks and summoned creatures in combat.
Capable of enduring multiple attacks with 84 hit points.
test_queries: agile fey creature in the forest
cunning fey that summons woodland allies
fey creature that knocks enemies prone
